text: Adolf Fischera (22 August 1888 - 25 August 1938) was an Austrian international footballer. He played for ASK Schwechat, Wiener AC, Wiener AF, SC Germania Schwechat, Borussia Neunkirchen and First Vienna FC. He made 15 appearances for the Austria national team and scored eight goals. On 26 May 1912 WAF hosted a match with Middlesex Wanderers whom they beat 5-1 where he scored a hattrick for WAF. For Borussia Neunkirchen he was playing manager. He was also part of Austria's squad for the 1912 Summer Olympics football tournament , but he did not play in any matches. == Honours == * 1 × Austrian Champion: 1914 * 3 × Runnuer-up Austrian championship: 1913, 1915, 1924 * 1 × Austrian Cup: 1922 * 1 × Southgerman Cup: 1921 ==References== ==Other websites== * * Worldfootball.net profile Category:1888 births Category:1938 deaths Category:Association football forwards Category:Austrian footballers Category:Players of the Austrian national football team Category:Austrian football forwards Category:Austrian football champions
title: Adolf Fischera
